javafx.beans.binding

Interface NumberBinding

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Binding<java.lang.Number>, NumberExpression, Observable, ObservableNumberValue, ObservableValue<java.lang.Number>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DoubleBinding, FloatBinding, IntegerBinding, LongBinding

    public interface NumberBinding
extends Binding<java.lang.Number>, NumberExpression
    A tagging interface to mark all Bindings that wrap a number-value.
    See Also:
    Binding, NumberExpression
